title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.53 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.53 - General

State Regulations

Materials for pipe and components must be: (a) able to maintain the structural integrity
of the pipeline under temperature and other environmental conditions that may
be anticipated; (b) chemically
compatible with any gas that they transport and with any other material in the
pipe with which they are in contact; and
(c) qualified in accordance with the
applicable requirements of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.53

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
